given an array of integers return an array of its products

February 15, 2016 â€” 07:09

Write a function that takes in an array of integers and returns an array of the products.

Example:

Code Overview: Use a double for loop. In each iteration of the outer for loop use the inner for loop to iterate through the entire array. Multiply all the values being iterated across in the inner for loop except when the current array value of the outer for loop is equal to the current array value of the inner for loop.
